Generation VII.Sun: Its long, striking legs aren't just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.
Generation VII.Moon: A Pokémon known for the beauty of its well-shaped legs, it sometimes appears as a mascot in advertisements for beauty salons.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can knock out even kickboxing champions with a single blow.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: A Pokémon with an aggressive personality and a mastery of kicking, it cackles every time it kicks an opponent.

Generation VIII.Sword: This feared Pokémon has long, slender legs and a cruel heart. It shows no mercy as it stomps on its opponents.
Generation VIII.Shield: A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon's legs leaves a wound in the opponent's body and soul that will never heal.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. However, it is said that a Tsareena will instantly become calm if someone touches the crown on its calyx.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon launches fierce yet elegant kicks with its long, slender legs. It views Quaquaval as its rival.

Generation VIII.Sword: Stony Wilderness Dappled Grove , Giant's Mirror ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Stony Wilderness Dappled Grove , Giant's Mirror ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Loop Lagoon ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Socarrat Trail ( Psychic Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Socarrat Trail ( Psychic Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ )
